languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт выглядит потерянной.{/n} "Значит, мы были обречены... Я должна была остаться на Крударахе. Могла попытаться помочь тем, кто пережил бедствие... Если бы только не избрала этот проклятый Путь и не покинула мир-корабль, я могла хотя бы попытаться кого-то спасти!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ирлиэт выглядит потерянной.{/n} "Значит, мы были обречены... Я должна была остаться на Крударахе. Могла попытаться помочь тем, кто пережил бедствие... Если бы только не избрала этот проклятый Путь и не покинула мир-корабль, я могла хотя бы попытаться кого-то спасти!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт выглядит потерянной.{/n} "Значит, мы были обречены... Я должна была остаться на Крударахе. Могла попытаться помочь тем, кто пережил бедствие... Если бы только не избрала этот проклятый Путь и не покинула мир-корабль, я могла хотя бы попытаться кого-то спасти!"

{n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save somebody!"

{n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

{n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

{n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet parece perdida.{/n} «Entonces estamos condenados... debí quedarme en Crudarach. Podría haber intentado ayudar a los supervivientes del desastre... ¡Si no hubiese escogido esa maldita senda que me llevó fuera del mundo astronave, al menos podría haber salvado a alguien!».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet parece perdida.{/n} «Entonces estamos condenados... debí quedarme en Crudarach. Podría haber intentado ayudar a los supervivientes del desastre... ¡Si no hubiese escogido esa maldita senda que me llevó fuera del mundo astronave, al menos podría haber salvado a alguien!».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは呆然としている。{/n} 「我々は絶望的だった…私はクルダラに残るべきだった。あの災害を生き延びた人たちを助けることもできたのに…あの呪われた道を選ばず、方舟を離れさえしなければ、少なくとも誰かを救う努力はできたはずだった！」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは呆然としている。{/n} 「我々は絶望的だった…私はクルダラに残るべきだった。あの災害を生き延びた人たちを助けることもできたのに…あの呪われた道を選ばず、方舟を離れさえしなければ、少なくとも誰かを救う努力はできたはずだった！」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特看起来很迷茫。{/n}“也就是说，我们早就遭到了诅咒……我本该留在克鲁达拉赫，我本可以尽力帮助那些从灾难中幸存下来的人……要是我没有选择那条该死的道途，没有离开方舟世界就好了！那样的话，我至少可以试着拯救一部分人！”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特看起来很迷茫。{/n}“也就是说，我们早就遭到了诅咒……我本该留在克鲁达拉赫，我本可以尽力帮助那些从灾难中幸存下来的人……要是我没有选择那条该死的道途，没有离开方舟世界就好了！那样的话，我至少可以试着拯救一部分人！”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet semble perdue.{/n} « Alors, nous étions condamnés... J'aurais dû rester sur Crudarach. J'aurais pu tenter d'aider les survivants... Si seulement je n'avais pas choisi cette maudite Voie et quitté le vaisseau-monde, j'aurais au moins pu essayer de sauver quelqu'un ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet semble perdue.{/n} « Alors, nous étions condamnés... J'aurais dû rester sur Crudarach. J'aurais pu tenter d'aider les survivants... Si seulement je n'avais pas choisi cette maudite Voie et quitté le vaisseau-monde, j'aurais au moins pu essayer de sauver quelqu'un ! »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet scheint verloren zu sein.{/n} "Wir waren also dem Untergang geweiht ... Ich hätte auf Crudarach bleiben sollen. Ich hätte versuchen können, den Überlebenden der Katastrophe zu helfen ... Hätte ich doch bloß nicht den verfluchten Pfad beschritten und das Weltenschiff verlassen, dann hätte ich wenigstens die Chance bekommen, jemanden zu retten!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet scheint verloren zu sein.{/n} "Wir waren also dem Untergang geweiht ... Ich hätte auf Crudarach bleiben sollen. Ich hätte versuchen können, den Überlebenden der Katastrophe zu helfen ... Hätte ich doch bloß nicht den verfluchten Pfad beschritten und das Weltenschiff verlassen, dann hätte ich wenigstens die Chance bekommen, jemanden zu retten!"

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, düşüncelere dalmış gibi duruyor.{/n} "O hâlde ölüme mahkûmuz. Crudarach'ta kalmalıydım. Felaketten sağ kurtulanlara yardım etmeye çalışmalıydım. Bu kahrolası Yolu seçip gemidünyadan ayrılmasaydım birilerini kurtarmaya çabalayabilirdim!"
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks lost.{/n} "So we were doomed... I should have stayed on Crudarach. I could have tried to help those who survived the disaster... If only I had not chosen that accursed Path and left the craftworld, I could have at least tried to save someone!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, düşüncelere dalmış gibi duruyor.{/n} "O hâlde ölüme mahkûmuz. Crudarach'ta kalmalıydım. Felaketten sağ kurtulanlara yardım etmeye çalışmalıydım. Bu kahrolası Yolu seçip gemidünyadan ayrılmasaydım birilerini kurtarmaya çabalayabilirdim!"
